segments.text: So , got any more ideas for the website ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , since we're collecting gifts instead of red envelopes , I made a " for guests only " gift chat room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we registered at Macy's . People can just buy gifts there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Taiwanese won't have time to buy gifts in America . The chat room is more convenient .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're right . They can discuss what to get and avoid buying the same things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Or discuss what gifts they could buy together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can also put a guest book on the website for people to sign and write comments .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And we were going to make a collage for each of us using our baby pictures ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , that will be the best part . Jack hasn't seen yours yet , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . He has no idea what a fat little pig I was !
segments.speaker: S1
